title: Herbal Immune Parcel (Seasonal Box)
excerpt: A curated seasonal immunity box featuring 5–7 Ayurvedic essentials including teas, syrups, gummies, and kadha mixes.
content:
## What Is the Herbal Immune Parcel?
A thoughtfully curated seasonal wellness box featuring 5–7 immunity-support essentials such as herbal teas, syrup shots, kadha mixes, and amla-ginger gummies. Designed for seasonal transitions when the immune system needs extra nourishment.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Seasonal junctions (ritu sandhi) are key periods for immune volatility. Ayurveda encourages herbs like tulsi, ginger, amla, and honey-based preparations to maintain resilience.

### Key Benefits
- Comprehensive seasonal immune support.
- Perfect for gifting to family, friends, or employees.
- Includes a guided booklet with dosha notes.

## Typical Ingredients (Seasonal Variation)
- Tulsi tea blend
- Amla or ginger gummies
- Honey-based immunity syrup
- Kadha mix (ginger–black pepper–tulsi)
- Optional: Chyawanprash sachet

## Usage Instructions
- Follow individual product instructions inside the box.

## Packaging
- Beautifully designed gift box with an instruction booklet and dosha-based suggestions.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult a practitioner for children, pregnant individuals, or those with chronic conditions.

## Why Choose This Parcel?
A complete, ready-made seasonal immune kit rooted in classical Ayurvedic herbs.
